breakdowns.description: Allows the user to add a new task with a title, description, priority, and due date.
conditions: Task must include title, description, priority, and due date.

breakdowns.description: Allows the user to edit the details of an existing task.
Allows the user to delete a task.
conditions: Confirmation prompt must be shown before deleting a task.

breakdowns.header: Mark Task as Completed or Pending
breakdowns.description: Allows the user to mark a task as either completed or pending.
Allows the user to assign categories to tasks (e.g., Work, Personal, Study).
Allows the user to filter tasks by their status: All, Completed, or Pending.
Allows the user to sort tasks by due date or priority.
Ensures the application is responsive and usable on both desktop and mobile devices.
Displays clear visual indicators to distinguish completed tasks.
Displays a message when no tasks exist.
Stores tasks using browser local storage or a backend database and ensures tasks persist after a page refresh.
conditions: Tasks must persist after page refresh.
Tasks must be stored using browser local storage or backend database.

breakdowns.description: Allows the user to search for tasks using a keyword.
Allows the user to toggle between dark mode and light mode.
Displays statistics for total tasks, completed tasks, and pending tasks.
conditions: Statistics must include total tasks, completed tasks, and pending tasks.

breakdowns.description: Allows the user to reorder tasks using drag-and-drop.
